name: OpenAI
description: Integrate with OpenAI to chat, create, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: Chat Completion
tools.description: Create a chat completion using OpenAI models. Send a list of messages and receive an AI-generated response.

tools.name: Create Embedding
tools.description: Generate vector embeddings for input text using OpenAI embedding models. Useful for semantic search and similarity.

tools.name: List Models
tools.description: List all models available to the authenticated OpenAI account. Returns model IDs and ownership info.

tools.name: Create Image
tools.description: Generate images using DALL-E. Provide a text prompt and optionally specify size and quality.

tools.name: Moderate
tools.description: Check text for policy violations using the OpenAI Moderation API. Returns category flags and scores.
